alert.note: Alert for Ford; La Salle; Livingston (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 12:27PM CDT until June 29 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Livingston County in central Illinois... Southwestern La Salle County in north central Illinois... Ford County in east central Illinois... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1226 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Roanoke to near Danvers to near Lincoln, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Streator, Pontiac, Paxton, Dwight, Fairbury, Gibson City, Chatsworth, Gridley, Forrest, Flanagan, Wenona, Odell, South Streator, Piper City, Cullom, Cornell, Saunemin, Melvin, Roberts and Rutland. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 188 and 217. I-57 between mile markers 258 and 263. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
